alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with heavy rainfall will impact portions of southeastern Frontier County through 345 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with heavy rainfall near Indianola, or 11 miles northeast of McCook, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Orafino, Freedom and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
